lead_paragraph: A former president of Guatemala's soccer federation pleaded guilty on Friday to charges he received bribes to award lucrative media and marketing rights for soccer matches, the latest development in the U.S. corruption investigation into world soccer's governing body FIFA.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Guatemalan Soccer Chief Pleads Guilty to U.S. Bribery Charges
headline.main: Ex-Guatemalan Soccer Chief Pleads Guilty to U.S. Bribery Charges
